mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'EXPENSE' as type, e.expense_date AS transaction_date, e.amount, e.description, exp.categoryName, e.payment_method FROM EXPENSE e JOIN CATEGORY_EX exp ON e.category = exp.id UNION ALL SELECT 'INCOME' as type, i.income_date AS transaction_date, i.amount, i.description, inc.categoryName, i.payment_method FROM INCOME i JOIN CATEGORY_IN inc ON i.category = inc.id ) ORDER BY transaction_date
